FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid

FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid Class Reference

Compartmentises collision checking to keep redundant checks to a minimum. More...

Detailed Description

Compartmentises collision checking to keep redundant checks to a minimum.

Member Function Documentation

int FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::_getGridPosition (  FusionPhysicsBody *  body  ) 
 

Finds the correct position (i.e. vector index) within the collision grid for a specific body.

void FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::_updateThis (  FusionPhysicsBody *  body  ) 
 

Ensures a specific body will be updated when Resort is called.

Used internally by FusionPhysicsWorld when it moves a body.

FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::BodyList FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::FindAdjacentBodies (  FusionPhysicsBody *  body  ) 
 

Checks for bodies which may collide with the given body.

This is probably the most important function of the CollisionBody class.

Returns:
a STL vector of FusionPhysicsBodys

void FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::ResortAll (   ) 
 

Places all bodies at their correct positions within the grid.

This action is not immediate, the actual sort takes place the next time FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::Resort() is called. Call FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::ForceResortAll() for an immeadiate resort.

void FusionPhysicsCollisionGrid::SetScale (  float  scale,
int  level_x,
int  level_y
) 
 

Sets the grid scale.

The level dimensions must be provided to work out the new grid dimensions.

Parameters:
scale The scale of the grid compared to the level. From 0.01f to 1.f
level_x Self explanatory.
